modName: Coats for Skyrim - Cover your armor
summary: Adds a Fur Coat to go over your armor!
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome! This is my first mod, Coats for Skyrim. 
[/center]This is a simple mod that adds a Skaal coat that you can wear over your existing armor.
The coat can be crafted at the tanning rack for 5 leather and 3 leather strips.
It is available for both men and women.
The Coat uses slot 45.

I recommend using this with Frostfall, Campfire, Wearable Lanterns, and Bandolier - Bags and Pouches.
Use Frostfall's MCM to configure your warmth-coverage levels

Frostfall : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/

Campfire : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798/

Wearable Lanterns : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/

Bandolier - Bags and Pouches : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/

If there are any problems, please let me know.
The coat is probably going to clip with a lot of bulky armors, but it fits pretty good with most of the apparel I tried.
The arms of the coat don't appear in first person.
author: QwibQwibMods
